item.title: Version 0.7.5
item.description:
Retrace v

This release focuses on reliability, privacy controls, and major timeline upgrades.

New in Timeline

  • Segment comments with attachments: Add long-form markdown comments to timeline blocks, attach files, and view full comment threads directly in timeline.
  • Tag color indicators: Timeline tape now shows tag colors for faster visual scanning.
  • Scroll orientation option: Choose horizontal (left/right) or vertical (up/down) scrubbing behavior in Settings.

Privacy Improvements

  • Frame redaction pipeline: Add window-title and browser-URL redaction rules in Settings. Matching frames are masked at capture time.
  • Redaction transparency: Timeline now surfaces redaction reasons so it’s clear why a frame is masked.

Power & OCR Controls

  • Expanded OCR power settings: Pause OCR, process only when plugged in, pause OCR in Low Power Mode, tune OCR priority, and filter OCR by app.
  • System Monitor updates: Better visibility into OCR queue and processing behavior.

Capture & Stability

  • More robust URL capture: Hardened browser URL extraction pipeline with safer subprocess handling, timeouts, and retries.
  • Smoother frame transitions: Improved reliability around active-window changes.
  • Reduced UI stalls/encoder aborts: Main-thread and encoder-path hardening for steadier long-running capture sessions.
  • Timed pause controls: Pause capture for 5/30/60 minutes with auto-resume countdown in menu bar.

Setup & Release Quality

  • Onboarding: Added app URL permission preflight to improve first-run reliability.
  • Release guardrails: Added stricter preflight checks and sleep/wake validation tooling for safer releases.
  • Test suite cleanup: Internal test reliability improvements.

item.title: Version 0.7.0
item.description:
What's New in v0.7.0

What's New

  • Smart Processing Levels — Replaced the manual OCR FPS slider with an intuitive Processing Level system (Low / Medium / High) for simpler performance tuning
  • Natural Language Jump-To — The "Jump to" dialog now understands natural language dates like "yesterday morning" or "last Tuesday"
  • Unified Search Routing — Deep links and search queries now route seamlessly through a single, consistent path

Improvements

  • Faster Timeline — Major main-thread performance improvements for smoother scrolling, rendering, and navigation
  • Revamped Filters — Redesigned date and filter popovers with inclusive date filtering so results include your full selected range
  • Dashboard Polish — Cleaner dashboard layout with improved storage usage visuals and removed distracting persistent alerts
  • Redesigned Monitor Tooltips — System monitor indicators now show richer, better-formatted status information
  • Better Feedback Diagnostics — Feedback submissions now include detailed system diagnostics to help us resolve issues faster
  • High-Resolution Display Support — Improved downscaling for Retina and high-DPI monitors to reduce resource usage

Fixes

  • Fixed timeline flickering caused by double-rerender cycles
  • Fixed deep link navigation not jumping to the correct timestamp
  • Fixed refresh introducing large time gaps in the timeline
  • Fixed thread safety issues in timeline data access

item.title: Version 0.6.0
item.description:
What's New in v0.6.0

Live View & Timeline

  • Instant OCR on live view — hover and copy any text on your screen in real time
  • True smooth scrolling on the timeline, no more frame-by-frame jumps
  • Mouse drag scrubbing — click and drag to scrub through your history
  • Shift+drag support on live view
  • Video playback controls with play/pause
  • Fixed multi-display scaling issues
  • Escape and search result clicks now clear active filters automatically

Search

  • Advanced metadata filters — filter by window title and browser now
  • Cmd+K spotlight search in Settings
  • Cleaned up and streamlined the entire search UI
  • Fixed remaining search result highlighting problems

Performance

  • 3-5x reduction in energy usage with tile-based OCR change detection and caching
  • Power-aware OCR — throttles on battery, ramps up when plugged in (configurable in settings)
  • Fixed UI freezes from background task pile-up
  • Storage health monitoring
  • New OCR system monitor dashboard for real-time processing stats

Keyboard Shortcuts

  • Fixed complex multi-modifier shortcuts not registering
  • Consistent shortcut behavior across the app
  • Added more shortcuts for common actions

Quality of Life

  • Permission monitoring for screen recording and accessibility
  • Playhead undo functionality (Press cmd z to go back to timestamp)
  • Configurable pause recording reminder
  • App exclusion list in privacy settings
  • Fixed app relaunch ghost instance issue
  • Polished drag interactions and share menu reliability

item.title: Version 0.5.1
item.description:
Bug Fixes & Improvements

  • Memory leak fix: Fixed a memory leak issue
  • Storage protection: Recording now automatically stops if your storage drive becomes disconnected, preventing data loss
  • Keyboard shortcuts: Fixed an issue where shortcuts wouldn't register; you can now also clear shortcuts by pressing Delete or clicking the × button
  • Search navigation: Pressing Escape after viewing a search result now returns you to your search results instead of closing the overlay
  • Natural language search: Time queries like "827am" now work the same as "8:27am"
  • UI polish: Fixed spacing in the feedback form

item.title: Version 0.5.0
item.description:
Retrace 0.5.0

Highlights

  • Major Timeline upgrade: faster scrubbing/scrolling, seamless open/close, improved readability, "show context" in filtered mode, and tighter macOS-native feel.
  • Much better Search: Unicode-aware full-text search (better accuracy for non-ASCII text) and improved search UX with grouped/expanded results.
  • Tags + filtering: tag your history and filter the timeline by app, URL, title, and tags.
  • New Dashboard: redesigned analytics with charts/breakdowns (including better browser breakdowns with favicon support) and daily metrics.

New

  • Custom database location and custom storage location support.
  • Recording shortcuts + improved settings experience.
  • Local-only analytics logging for internal usage/debug (no cloud dependency).
  • Milestone/achievement notifications and reminders for required permissions.

Performance

  • Faster timeline block calculations and improved timeline responsiveness.
  • OCR pipeline improvements: faster realtime OCR for recent frames.
  • Video improvements: better compression, fixed B-frame issues, and updated seeking.
  • Reduced flicker when switching videos on the timeline.

Fixes

  • Rewind importer/querying fixes and improved reliability.
  • Better browser URL/title extraction (more browsers supported).
  • Segment persistence improvements across Mac sleep/wake.
  • Keyboard shortcut fixes and better text selection/copy behavior.
  • UI polish: unified colors, improved settings, and updated highlight styling.

Note: This update includes database migrations. First launch may take a bit longer.
